data.Sentence_cn: 我的女儿简从未想过会接到荷兰一位同龄姑娘的来信。
data.Sentence: My daughter, Jane, never dreamed of receiving a letter from a girl of her own age in Holland.

data.Sentence_cn: 去年，当我们横渡英吉利海峡时，简把写有她姓名和住址的一张纸条装进了一只瓶子，
data.Sentence: Last year, we were travelling across the Channel and Jane put a piece of paper with her name and address on it into a bottle.
She threw the bottle into the sea.

data.Sentence_cn: 此后她就再没去想那只瓶子。
data.Sentence: She never thought of it again,

data.Sentence_cn: 但10个月以后，她收到了荷兰一位姑娘的来信。
data.Sentence: but ten months later, she received a letter from a girl in Holland.

data.Sentence_cn: 现在这两位姑娘定期通信了。
data.Sentence: Both girls write to each other regularly now.

data.Sentence_cn: 然而她们还是决定利用邮局。
data.Sentence: However, they have decided to use the post office.

data.Sentence_cn: 这样会稍微多花点钱，但肯定是快得多了。
data.Sentence: Letters will cost a little more, but they will certainly travel faster.
